text: The two angels came to Sodom in the evening while Lot was sitting in the city’s gateway. When Lot saw them, he got up to meet them and bowed down with his face toward the ground.

He said, “Here, my lords, please turn aside to your servant’s house. Stay the night and wash your feet. Then you can be on your way early in the morning.” “No,” they replied, “we’ll spend the night in the town square.”
But he urged them persistently, so they turned aside with him and entered his house. He prepared a feast for them, including bread baked without yeast, and they ate.

<st data-num="02962" class="">Before</st> they could <st data-num="07901" class="">lie down to sleep</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st>—<st data-num="0582" class="">both</st> <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st>, from <st data-num="05971 07098">every part</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st>—<st data-num="05437 05921">surrounded</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.<n id="2" />
They shouted to Lot, “Where are the men who came to you tonight? Bring them out to us so we can take carnal knowledge of them!”
Lot went outside to them, shutting the door behind him.
He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0408 04994">No</st>, my <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>! Don’t <st data-num="07489" class="">act so wickedly</st>!<n id="1" />

Look, I have two daughters who have never been intimate with a man. Let me bring them out to you, and you can do to them whatever you please. Only don’t do anything to these men, for they have come under the protection of my roof.”

“Out of our way!” they cried, “This man came to live here as a foreigner, and now he dares to judge us! We’ll do more harm to you than to them!” They kept pressing in on Lot until they were close enough to break down the door.
So the men inside reached out and pulled Lot back into the house as they shut the door.

Then they <st data-num="05221" class="">struck</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were at the <st data-num="06607" class="">door</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, from the <st data-num="06996" class="">youngest</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">oldest</st>,<n id="1" /> with <st data-num="05575" class="">blindness</st>. The men outside<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03811" class="">wore themselves out</st> trying to <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">door</st>.

Then the two <st data-num="0376" class="">visitors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03876" class="">Lot</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">else</st> do you have <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st>?<n id="2" /> Do you have<n id="3" /> any <st data-num="02860" class="">sons-in-law</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, or <st data-num="03605 0834">other relatives</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>?<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03318" class="">Get</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> this<n id="5" /> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>
because we are about to destroy it. The outcry against this place is so great before the Lord that he has sent us to destroy it.”

Then Lot went out and spoke to his sons-in-law who were going to marry his daughters. He said, “Quick, get out of this place because the Lord is about to destroy the city!” But his sons-in-law thought he was ridiculing them.
At dawn the angels hurried Lot along, saying, “Get going! Take your wife and your two daughters who are here, or else you will be destroyed when the city is judged!”
When Lot hesitated, the men grabbed his hand and the hands of his wife and two daughters because the Lord had compassion on them. They led them away and placed them outside the city.
When they had brought them outside, they said, “Run for your lives! Don’t look behind you or stop anywhere in the valley! Escape to the mountains or you will be destroyed!”
But Lot said to them, “No, please, Lord!

Your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> has <st data-num="02009 04994 04672">found</st> <st data-num="02580" class="">favor</st> with <st data-num="05869" class="">you</st>,<n id="2" /> and you have <st data-num="01431" class="">shown</st> me <st data-num="01431" class="">great</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="02617 0834 06213 05978">kindness</st><n id="4" /> by <st data-num="02421" class="">sparing</st><n id="5" /> my <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st>. But <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">am</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03201" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="04422" class="">escape</st> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> <st data-num="06435" class="">because</st><n id="6" /> this <st data-num="07451" class="">disaster</st> will <st data-num="01692" class="">overtake</st><n id="7" /> me and I’ll <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.<n id="8" />
Look, this town over here is close enough to escape to, and it’s just a little one. Let me go there. It’s just a little place, isn’t it? Then I’ll survive.”
“Very well,” he replied, “I will grant this request too and will not overthrow the town you mentioned.
Run there quickly, for I cannot do anything until you arrive there.” (This incident explains why the town was called Zoar.)
The sun had just risen over the land as Lot reached Zoar.
Then the Lord rained down sulfur and fire on Sodom and Gomorrah. It was sent down from the sky by the Lord.

So he <st data-num="02015" class="">overthrew</st> <st data-num="0411" class="">those</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> that <st data-num="03603" class="">region</st>,<n id="1" /> including <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and the <st data-num="06780">vegetation that grew</st> from the <st data-num="0127">ground</st>.<n id="2" />
But Lot’s wife looked back longingly and was turned into a pillar of salt.
Abraham got up early in the morning and went to the place where he had stood before the Lord.
He looked out toward Sodom and Gomorrah and all the land of that region. As he did so, he saw the smoke rising up from the land like smoke from a furnace.
So when God destroyed the cities of the region, God honored Abraham’s request. He removed Lot from the midst of the destruction when he destroyed the cities Lot had lived in.
Lot went up from Zoar with his two daughters and settled in the mountains because he was afraid to live in Zoar. So he lived in a cave with his two daughters.

Later the <st data-num="01067" class="">older daughter</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06810" class="">younger</st>, “Our <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="02204" class="">is old</st>, and <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">country</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="0935" class="">sleep</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> us,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> <st data-num="03605 0776">everyone</st> does.
Come, let’s make our father drunk with wine so we can go to bed with him and preserve our family line through our father.”
So that night they made their father drunk with wine, and the older daughter came in and went to bed with her father. But he was not aware of when she lay down with him or when she got up.

So in the <st data-num="04283" class="">morning</st> the <st data-num="01067" class="">older daughter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06810" class="">younger</st>, “<st data-num="02005">Since</st> I <st data-num="07901" class="">went to bed</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0570" class="">last night</st>, let’s <st data-num="08248" class="">make</st> him <st data-num="03196" class="">drunk</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01571" class="">again</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">tonight</st>. Then you <st data-num="0935" class="">go in</st> and <st data-num="07901" class="">go to bed</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him so we can <st data-num="02421" class="">preserve</st> our <st data-num="02233" class="">family line</st> through our <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>.”<n id="4" />
So they made their father drunk that night as well, and the younger one came and went to bed with him. But he was not aware of when she lay down with him or when she got up.
In this way both of Lot’s daughters became pregnant by their father.

The <st data-num="01067" class="">older daughter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03205" class="">gave birth to</st> a <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> and <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st> him <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> is the <st data-num="01" class="">ancestor</st> of the <st data-num="04124" class="">Moabites</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">of</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>.
The younger daughter also gave birth to a son and named him Ben Ammi. He is the ancestor of the Ammonites of today.
